description: 1. The 'Expense recorder' on Palm is an effective expense tracker which can help you record your expenses.    2. This application is specially designed to track all your business & personal expenses.    3. As many as 5 different reports can be seen anytime    4. The generated reports which are easy to use & understand can be very helpful to you in order to track your spending.    5. You can even add your income & the application will compare your income & your expenses    6. Navigations are easier as navigation buttons are provided on each screen    7. Customizable category section both in Income and expenses    8. Now you can record your expenses within quick time wherever you are.  Features      * Navigations are easier as navigation buttons are provided on each screen     * Screen shots of your reports can be taken & saved on to your blackberry     * Customizable category section for your expenses     * Get the summary of your expenses daily, weekly, monthly & yearly     * Set password for your privacy purpose     * Search for the reports & easily locate your expense records.
